https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/1lKA9PaVyRNpHZb0Df4XOiGNln2.jpg The human being feels generally as fascinated as fearful before death and the inevitable fact of dying. Workers at the cemetery of Palma de Mallorca, in Spain, face this harsh reality every day, so they have found a way to deal with it. City of the Dead
